Key Match Events: Aaron Wiggins knocked down five 3-pointers in the fourth quarter and finished the contest with 19 points
The Thunder overcame a 14-point deficit to secure the victory
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Karl-Anthony Towns added 17 points and 22 rebounds
Oklahoma City led the Knicks 44-5 in points off the bench
Oklahoma City center Isaiah Hartenstein faced off against his former team for the first time since leaving in free agency
